node.title: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame responds to Dolly Parton
node.description: Parton pulled herself out of the nominations earlier this week, saying she doesn't have a rock 'n' roll album.
node.content: ["Dolly Parton pulled herself out of the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame nominations earlier this week, saying she isn't worthy since she's never made a rock 'n' roll album. But the hall of fame says she's earned the right to the honor and that rock 'n' roll is not defined by any one genre.", "While the country music icon and philanthropist, 76, said she was \"extremely flattered and grateful\" to be nominated \u2013 she didn't want the votes to be split because of her nomination. So, she respectfully bowed out.", "The Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, which nominated 17 artists this year \u2013 including Parton, rapper Eminem and R&B singer Lionel Richie \u2013 has responded.\u00a0", "\"All of us in the music community have seen Dolly Parton's thoughtful note expressing her feeling that she has not earned the right to be inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame,\" spokeswoman Shauna Wilson said in a statement. \"In addition to her incredible talent as an artist, her humility is another reason Dolly is a beloved icon by millions of fans around the world.\"", "Rock 'n' roll has had deep roots in R&B and country music since its inception and is a sound that moves youth culture, the statement reads. Parton's music \"impacted a generation of young fans and influenced countless artists that followed,\" Wilson said.\u00a0", "The country icon's nomination followed the same process as all other artists who have been considered. Nominated artists are often not traditional rock 'n' roll stars. This year, 80s pop duo Eurythmics is nominated. Last year's inductees included rapper Jay-Z.", "In her statement, Parton said she hopes the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame will understand and be willing to consider her again \u2013 if she ever records a rock 'n' roll album.", "The hall of fame, however, said Parton's nomination, along with the other 16 artists for the class of 2022, was sent out earlier this month to 1,200 general ballot voters. \"We are in awe of Dolly's brilliant talent and pioneering spirit and are proud to have nominated her for induction into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame,\" Wilson said.\u00a0", "Of the 17 nominees this year,\u00a0voters can choose five\u00a0to be inducted into the 2022 class. It appears Parton could still be one of the five chosen, even if she is too humble to accept.\u00a0", "Caitlin O'Kane is a digital content producer covering trending stories for CBS News and its good news brand, The Uplift."]
